survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Ergonomics Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with workplace ergonomics and identify areas for improvement to enhance comfort and productivity.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ergonomic setup of your current workstation?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for easy selection.

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture comprehensive feedback. Randomize option order to reduce bias.
